references:
The performance of the control strategies outlined in Section III was evaluated using the metrics described in Section II-B. The results from the experiments are summarized in table I. ± 40° for 60 seconds, and another experiment involving the average absolute distance to the target during a 80-second experiment run with varying target pitches. The second experiment is illustrated in Fig. 5.
